Section 16 of the MSMED Act provides that in case buyer fails to make payment of amount to the MSME supplier, then the buyer shall be liable to pay compound interest with monthly rest to such supplier. This provision has an overriding effect on the agreement, if any, between the buyer and the MSME supplier.

Further, Section 17 of MSMED Act provides that for goods supplied or services rendered by the MSME supplier, the buyer shall be liable to pay amount with interest thereon as provided under Section 16.
Section 16 of the MSMED Act provides that the buyer shall be liable to pay compound interest with monthly rest to the MSME supplier at three times the bank rate notified by the RBI.
